title: Quick Instagram profile checker
description: Only profile URLs accepted, you will get profile data and limited most recent posts

directUrls.title: Add Instagram profile URLs you want to scrape
directUrls.description: Add one or more Instagram profile URLs to scrape.

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: A proxy server is required to run this actor! Either use an Apify residential proxy, or provide your own proxy servers. Datacenter proxies will not work.
proxy.sectionDescription: Select your proxy here. Use Residential for scrapping without login, but automatic for scraping with login! You can also change the maximum times the browser will retry requests and tell it how long to wait for the page to scroll.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max request retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Select how many times the page will be retried if the scraper is blocked or encounters other errors.
